}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :Wi-Fi 802.11bgn, Bluetooth 4.1, and Bluetooth Low Energy (LE)
*Brand Name: [[Texas Instruments]] • Model Name: WL18MODGB *Marketing Name: WL18xxMOD WiLink 8 Single-Band Combo Module
===Models=== *[[Texas Instruments WL18MODGI]] • Digital Transceiver Module :FCC ID: Z64-WL18DBMOD (2014-12-24) • Dual Band (WL1837) *[[Texas Instruments WL18MODGB]] • WiFi and Bluetooth Module :FCC ID: Z64-WL18SBMOD (2014-02-03) • Single Band (WL1835) *[[Texas Instruments WL1835MODCOM8B]] • WiFi and Bluetooth Evaluation board :FCC ID: Z64-WL1835COM (2014-02-03) • COM Port/Evaluation board *[[Texas Instruments WL1835MODGA]] • WiFi and Bluetooth Module :FCC ID: Z64-WL1835MOD (2013-11-08) • LGA Module (GW7835-T01A)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
